mapper.select: SELECT ctgry_id, adm_cd, ctgry_nm, ctgry_up_id, ctgry_reg_ymdt, ctgry_mdfcn_ymdt, ctgry_adm_cd FROM category ORDER BY ctgry_id ASC
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ctgry_id), '000') FROM category WHERE ctgry_up_id IS NULL OR ctgry_up_id = '' OR ctgry_up_id = '-'
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET ctgry_nm = #{ctgryNm}, ctgry_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW() WHERE ctgry_id = #{ctgryId}
